duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the design, development, and integration of speaker, microphone, and receiver modules into products.
Oversee internal efforts of Audio HW, Validation, and Tuning teams as well as externally with SW, Mechanical Engineering, and Operations teams.
Define and drive the build plan for multiple module integrators and serve as the primary interface during module development.
Manage and communicate project definition, development landmarks and schedules, and project status in the development of new acoustic modules.
Advocate for the best overall acoustic performance throughout the organization.
Prioritize issues, track the details, and drive a talented, passionate, experienced multi-functional team and external suppliers.
Deliver acoustic modules on schedule, facilitate risk management, and communicate status and issues to the development team and executives.
Understand the roles and responsibilities of the key partners and identify partners to efficiently drive key decisions, while remaining in touch with big picture issues.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Mechanical Engineering, Physics, or Electrical Engineering preferred
